goals.active: Meet Zojja at the Snaff Memorial Laboratory in Rata Sum.
goals.complete: Wow, was Zojja angry! That killer VAL-A golem can't have been my fault. I'd better head to Desider Atum and find out the truth of the matter.

goals.active: Locate the haywire VAL-A golem in Desider Atum.
goals.complete: Someone tampered with my VAL-A schematics, and built a murder-golem! Who would've done such a thing? I'd better find out, and quickly.
